text.section:
In this section, "public place" means a parking lot, common area, or general common element in:
A leased residential property, including attached single-family homes or a multifamily dwelling unit;
A condominium; or
A homeowners association.

In addition to other powers granted under this title, the governing body of a municipal corporation may adopt an ordinance or resolution to regulate the possession or consumption of alcoholic beverages in public places located within the boundaries of the municipal corporation.
